titles.title: A resolution making minority party appointments for the 111th Congress.
A resolution making minority party appointments for the 111th Congress.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
Senate Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
Senate Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Makes minority party appointments to the following Senate Committees for the 111th Congress: (1) Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry; (2) Foreign Relations; (3) Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs; (4) Small Business and Entrepreneurship; and (5) Aging.
